nodes.bodyText: Let's move this constants to CommonCreatorConstants class.
Could we use StringUtils.EMPTY or other meaningful name?
Maybe it would be useful (for other tests too) to create a new common method e.g. mockSecurityContext?
I would rather not divide this logic: doReturn(SecurityContextHolder.getContext().getAuthentication()).when(mockAuthManager).getAuthentication(); is another mock in this test.
